ValidationRule.description: When an enterprise asset is a physical asset, then serial number, model, PO number, acquisition date, warranty type, and warranty expiration must be populated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( RecordType.Name != "OnDemand Hosted", ISPICKVAL(Deployment_Type__c , "Physical"), OR ( ISBLANK(Serial_Number__c), ISBLANK(Product_ID__c), ISBLANK(Purchase_Order__c), ISBLANK(TEXT(Warranty_Type__c)), ISBLANK(Warranty_Expires__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: For physical assets, the Model, Serial Number, Purchase Order, Warranty Type, and Warranty Expiration must be entered in order to be able to save the record.
